```{r data}
library(dplyr)
```

## Fig 2
 
```{r Fig2}

library(ggplot2)
y<- filter(d, Vole_Presence == "vole")
y
n <- filter(d, Vole_Presence == "No vole")
n
ggplot(d) +
    geom_bar( aes(data = d, x=Vole_Presence, y=Change_PlantVol), stat="identity", fill="skyblue", alpha=0.001) +
    geom_errorbar( aes(x=no.voles.vs..voles, ymin=0.49, ymax=0.63), width=0.4, colour="orange", alpha=0.9, linewidth=1.3)
```
